atk-abh03a43:1_1: Idāni teyeva mūlayamake desite kusalādidhamme dhātuvasena saṅgaṇhitvā āyatanayamakānantaraṁ desitassa dhātuyamakassa vaṇṇanā hoti.
atk-abh03a43:1_3: Idhāpi hi paṇṇattivārādayo tayo mahāvārā, avasesā antaravārā ca saddhiṁ kālappabhedādīhi āyatanayamake āgatasadisāyeva.
atk-abh03a43:1_4: Idhāpi ca yamakapucchāsukhatthaṁ paṭipāṭiyā ajjhattikabāhirā rūpadhātuyova vatvā viññāṇadhātuyo vuttā.
atk-abh03a43:1_5: Dhātūnaṁ pana bahuttā idha āyatanayamakato bahutarāni yamakāni, yamakadiguṇā pucchā, pucchādiguṇā ca atthā honti.
atk-abh03a43:1_6: Tattha cakkhudhātumūlakādīsu yamakesu labbhamānānaṁ yamakānaṁ atthavinicchayo āyatanayamake vuttanayeneva veditabbo.
atk-abh03a43:1_7: Taṁsadisāyeva hettha atthagati, teneva ca kāraṇena pāḷipi saṅkhittā.
